name: Convex Finance
description: Convex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for CRV stakers and Curve liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Convex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning CVX token.

en.name: Convex Finance
en.description: Convex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for CRV stakers and Curve liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Convex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning CVX token.

fr.name: Convex Finance
fr.description: Convex Finance est une plate-forme conçue pour augmenter les récompenses des stakers de jetons CRV et les fournisseurs de liquidités sur Curve - avec une interface simple et facile à utiliser. Convex Finance vise à simplifier le staking et la fourniture de liquidités avec son jeton natif CVX.

es.name: Convex Finance
es.description: Convex Finance es una plataforma creada para aumentar las recompensas para los participantes de CRV y los proveedores de liquidez de Curve, todo en una interfaz simple y fácil de usar. Convex Finance tiene como objetivo simplificar el staking y la provisión de liquidez con su token CVX nativo que genera comisiones.

de.name: Convex Finance
de.description: Convex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for CRV stakers and Curve liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Convex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning CVX token.

tr.name: Convex Finance
tr.description: Convex Finance, CRV stake edenlerin ve Curve likidite sağlayıcılarının ödüllerini artırmak için basit ve kullanımı kolay bir arayüzde oluşturulmuş bir platformdur. Convex Finance, yerel ücretli CVX belirteci ile stake ve likidite sağlamayı basitleştirmeyi amaçlamaktadır.

vi.description: Convex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for CRV stakers and Curve liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Convex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning CVX token.

hi.description: Convex Finance is a platform built to boost rewards for CRV stakers and Curve liquidity providers - all in a simple and easy to use interface. Convex Finance aims to simplify staking and liquidity provision with its native fee-earning CVX token.

ja.name: Convex Finance
ja.description: Convex FinanceはCRVのステーキングユーザーとCurveの流動性プロバイダーの報酬を向上させるために構築されたプラットフォームであり、シンプルで使いやすいインターフェースを備えています。Convex Financeは、ネイティブ手数料を稼ぐことができるネイティブCVXトークンによるステーキングと流動性提供の簡素化を目的としています。
